name: Notion To-Do Manager
description: Organize your tasks and projects using this very simple and free Notion To-Do Manager!With this template, you can create tasks, assign due dates, prioritize tasks, and track your progress. This minimalist dashboard is designed to help you keep your tasks and projects organized and under control.Say goodbye to the frustration of missed deadlines and forgotten tasks and welcome a more productive and organized version of yourself.Pay what you want (or enter $0 to download for free!)Follow me on Twi
